body.name: Sprinkle & Sweep Hand Broom and Dustpan Set - Small Dust Pan & Handheld Brush with Bamboo Handle - Cleaning Tools for Home, Car, or Indoor Pet Care
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 44 mins
FREE pickup Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: QUALITY DESIGN: The mini hand broom is made with a premium engraved bamboo handle that feels comfortable in the hand. The dense, soft brush bristles are durable enough to pick up pet accidents or fur without scratching surfaces. The dust pan’s soft rubber lip is sturdy and lies perfectly flat against the floor. The raised bar keeps debris from spilling back out of the dustpan.

QUICK & EASY CLEANUP: Handheld whisk broom and dustpan are must-haves for any home. These cleaning essentials are easy enough for kids to use. Wisk away spills, debris, and dust off the floor in moments with no fuss.

COMPACT: The high-quality dustpan and hand broom are designed to be small and portable. The mini broom handle snaps into the dustpan, and the yarn loop allows for compact and easy hanging storage on a hook.

MULTIPURPOSE: This dustpan and brush combo is ideal for sweeping up messes in both indoor and outdoor settings, from your hardwood kitchen floors to your car, camper, furniture, and other upholstered seats. Effectively sweeps away hair, pet messes, spills, and more.
DESIGNED FOR SPRINKLE & SWEEP - Keep it separate and hygienic! Use this Dustpan Set for Pet Mess Cleanup with Sprinkle & Sweep!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very nicely made utilitarian item, works well, looks good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size, easy to clean
reviews.reviewText: Great little brush, compact and easy to store, rinses clean under the faucet, sturdy yet soft for quick clean-ups. I'm ordering more for use in the laundry room and potting shed. Five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So many foxtails & dustpans don’t work ideally and fall apart rather quickly in various ways. This one not only is nice to look at, it’s functional and well made. Finding one that works properly and allows for easy cleanup has just gotten easier! Thank you so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works good enough for me
reviews.reviewText: When I originally purchased sprinkle and sweep for the first time, I remember, seeing that, they sold their own dust pan and sweeper for the product and i already own a broom and couple of small, handheld dustpan and broom myself, but I wasn’t sure if the ones that I already had would work properly or efficiently with sprinkle and sweep since I’ve never tried a product like this, so just in case, I just want to head and got there broom as well. By the way, I want to mention that I love sprinkle and sweep, and in my case, I’m glad that I did get the broom that they sold because the ones that I already had. I know wouldn’t have worked well with the product add actually doing the swirling and sweeping it up properly, but if you have a similar kind of broom and dust pan that works well then I don’t think this is a total necessary thing you need to get. And I guess that’s part of the reason why I got it because when I was looking at the broom, I knew that the ones that I had didn’t really look like that , so that’s why I wasn’t really sure it would work. The only thing “con” that I guess I can mention is that I wish the dust pan worked a little bit better. But I wonder if any dust pan woodwork, any better because sprinkle and sweep is a really fine fine powdery substance, so I don’t think any broom or dust pan is going to do a 100% perfect job at getting everything off the floor. But honestly, I love everything about both the broom and the actual sprinkle and sweep product. It’s just I mentioned the last part because I can always hear the little crunch crunching noises underneath my house slippers, lol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and store. Light weight and perfect size for a small apartment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A basic dustpan & brush
reviews.reviewText: It’s a simple straightforward dustpan & brush. It’s easy to tuck out of the way. I’m just glad to get an uncomplicated product. I’ve bought others in past & they tried having extra features. Unnecessary. Stick with basis for basics.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It worked it a pinch
reviews.reviewText: Moving and desperate for a quick broom…. Found this on Amazon and the bristles are pretty sturdy it gets everything up and quickly as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Normal dustpan set
reviews.reviewText: Normal dustpan set. The rubber edging is kind of curved up- probably from shipping- but that makes it difficult to use. Probably the twine for hanging will probably break at some point and there's no other way to hang it.
